english.segment1: Black rose where are you now. White skin as cold as the snow we walked in. Your lips like midnight. That night we walked for hours. And I remember. But maybe I'm the only one who still remembers
english.segment2: You slipped away. Why would you come back to say. You've already moved on. You slipped away. But I've come back to say that you're not really gone
english.segment3: My black rose where are you now. And yes I've seen your black rose petal fall. Fall down to the ground like glass shatters. And turning into ashes. But I've seen your color and it's like a blood drop. And maybe I'm the only one. Who still remembers
english.segment4: You've slipped away. But why would you come back to say. You've already moved on. You slipped away. But I've come back to say that you're not really gone
english.segment5: So try to disappear. But my mind doesn't slip that easy. You can try to disappear. But my dear you're still standing here
english.segment6: You've slipped away. But why would you come back to say. You've already moved on. You slipped away. But I've come back to say that you're not really gone
